member.name: T:Npgsql.NpgsqlJsonNetExtensions
member.summary: Extension allowing adding the Json.NET plugin to an Npgsql type mapper.

member.name: M:Npgsql.NpgsqlJsonNetExtensions.UseJsonNet(Npgsql.TypeMapping.INpgsqlTypeMapper,System.Type[],System.Type[],Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Sets up JSON.NET mappings for the PostgreSQL json and jsonb types.
member.param: The type mapper to set up (global or connection-specific)
A list of CLR types to map to PostgreSQL jsonb (no need to specify NpgsqlDbType.Jsonb)
A list of CLR types to map to PostgreSQL json (no need to specify NpgsqlDbType.Json)
Optional settings to customize JSON serialization
